frontmatter.title: Road Map
frontmatter.subTitle: These are some features that will be developing soon.

featureList.heading: Customizable Shortcuts
featureList.description: Provide a way to make the default keyboard shortcuts customizable by the user.

featureList.heading: Toggle Native Titlebar
featureList.description: Enable user to switch between default custom titlebar to a native titlebar.

featureList.heading: Website Blocker
featureList.description: Enable user to block specific website while working in order to focus.

featureList.heading: Productivity Report
featureList.description: Provide some useful summary about user's productivity to have some sense of accomplishments.
